title: Ice Sickle
summaries: The Ice Sickle is a Hardmode melee weapon that fires a projectile with no ammunition or mana cost. Its wide projectile stops in midair a short distance from the player, spinning in mid-air for 5 seconds then disappearing. It can pierce enemies but disappears on the fifth hit. The Ice Sickle has a 0.56% (1/180) chance of being dropped by Armored Vikings, Ice Elementals, Ice Tortoises, and Icy Mermen in the Hardmode Snow and Ice biomes.

statistics.Damage: 42 / 40 (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 5
